website_summaries.verdict: Simple dining bench that goes well with a number of large tables. Extremely light to move around the space.
pros: Great wood finish that resists staining and corrosion from food and drink spills
Darker wood contrasts well with lighter decorations
cons: Legs can feel flimsy if not securely tightened when assembled

customer_reviews.title: The Finish Comes Off
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bench a year ago and were pleased with it at the time. It was the right size, the right color, and it comfortably fits my three young kids. Everything was great until a few months later. I started to notice that every time I wiped the bench off after my kids ate, the paper towel would come away brown. At first I thought the bench was just dirty, but as the months went by, the bench's color got lighter and lighter. A bit of the finish comes right off every time I clean it. Now the bench is not the right color at all and I am back on the market for a new bench.
customer_reviews.author: M. & K. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and looks really nice. Actually more complicated to put together than I thought it would be, but not impossible and I did it by myself. I will be purchasing another for the other side of the table, I like it that much. It was packaged very well and arrived with only some minor hair line scratches that are almost not noticeable. Fast shipping as well. Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great bench, shipping problems
customer_reviews.text: I love the bench itself. It was easy to assemble and it very sturdy. Both my kids sit on it at the same time during meals and it has worked out great. My only complaint was with the shipping. I waited 3 weeks for the bench and when it didn't come, Amazon did a great job of contacting the seller and sending a new one. I was more annoyed I had to wait another 2 weeks to receive my bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. really sturdy. I got a dinning room set really cheap that only came with 3 chairs and i got this bench for the side that did not have a chair and people can giving me complements of how beautiful it looks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench but not for a bar stool table
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is not a bench for a bar stool table falls 2 inches Shorth the color matches the picture I just added a cusion to add more length to it goes all the way across good sturdy hold 450 pounds no issue sturdy easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly very stir and matches prefer to my dinette set
customer_reviews.author: mz dana

customer_reviews.title: great product, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, good quality and even though not an exact match to our other "espresso/dark wood" furniture, its close enough and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lovepinke

customer_reviews.title: Dining bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Looks really nice and the price is great. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It was extremely easy to assemble. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: This bench is very sturdy and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very sturdy and looks beautiful. It goes well with my dining room set. I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Better Homes and Gardens Brown Two Seat Dining Bench, Mocha, Espresso for Table, Hallway, Entryway or Even Patio (Mocha)
product_meta.description: Add stylish seating to your table with the Better Homes and Gardens Bankston Dining Bench. This bench is designed to fit two people. Made from solid wood and veneer, it is constructed for increased durability. This Mocha 2-Seat Bench is easy to assemble and matches well with any existing home decor. Take your seating additions to the next level with the Better Homes and Gardens Bankston Dining Bench.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 47.75"L x 14"W x 18.5"H (121.3 cm x 35.6 cm x 46.9 cm)
